import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' export default function App() { const courses=[ {id: "MarcheF",nom:"Marche femmes",categorie:"F", distance:10000 }, {id: "MarcheH",nom:"Marche hommes",categorie:"H", distance:10000 }, {id: "MarathonF",nom:"Marathon fommes",categorie:"F", distance:42000 }, {id: "MarathonH",nom:"Marathon hommes",categorie:"H", distance:42000 } ] const [lists,setLists]=useState(curs); const [inpt,setinpt]=useState() return (
Nom :
Cathegorie : Homme Fammme
{ lists.map((e)=> ) }
id Nom idCourse action
{e.id}
) }
